uploads.subTitle: Upload a CSV File with the following columns: first_name, last_name, email, extension, mac_address, brand, family, model.
uploads.text: Drag and drop your file here to upload, or browse your computer.

success.headline: You successfully uploaded a CSV file, please click on Proceed to continue!

errors.wrongType: Invalid type, we only accept CSV files and we received: {{type}}

headline.second: Number of records in this file:
headline.third: We selected the first 5 records to help you review the mappings below and check to make sure they are correct. Once you've approved or fixed the mappings, go ahead and submit the import job.

errors.title: It appears that the columns matching didn't go as expected, please fix the following issues:
